column12: You are viewing a very clean and well maintained car indeed.This is a 1 owner,low mileage,carfax certified 2006 dodge Stratus SXT.As you can see from the pictures this car is in great shape inside and out.Everything works perfectly in this car and we warranty it a 100%.This Stratus is loaded including power windows,power locks,tilt,cruise and am/fm/cd. Don't miss out on this beauty,call or email today to schedule a test drive,I promise you will not be disappointed.

Seller's Description and Comments 
You are viewing a very clean and well maintained car indeed.This is a 1 owner,low mileage,carfax certified 2006 dodge Stratus SXT.As you can see from the pictures this car is in great shape inside and out.Everything works perfectly in this car and we warranty it a 100%.This Stratus is loaded including power windows,power locks,tilt,cruise and am/fm/cd. Don't miss out on this beauty,call or email today to schedule a test drive,I promise you will not be disappointed. 

At Sarinsky's Garage we would like to make you a customer for life. We don't just sell cars we service them too. All the techs here are extremely knowlegdeable and friendly. We can service any thing from inspections and oil changes to brakes and transmition work. Call us today!!! DON'T FORGET TO CHECK OUT OUR SPECIALS!!!!!
